#Edge cases were chosen for all opcodes + 5 randomly generated test pairs for each opcode. 
#Edge cases are 0x00000000, 0xffffffff, 0x00000001, 0x80000000 for inputs A and B. 
#Edge cases are 00000,11111 for input Sa.
#Randomly generated test pairs for add and subtract operations were selectively chosen for V output 1 and 0. Chose two pairs negatives, two pairs positive, and one pair of positive and negative for a total of five test pairs. 

A[32] 		B[32] 		Op[4] 		Sa[5] 		C[32] 		V[1]

#shift left logical, opcode =0000, Sa=0

0x00000000	0x00000000 	0000		00000	0x00000000		0
0x00000000 	0xffffffff	0000		00000	0xffffffff		0
0xffffffff 	0x00000000	0000		00000	0x00000000		0
0xffffffff	0xffffffff 	0000		00000	0xffffffff		0
0x00000001 	0x00000000	0000		00000	0x00000000		0

0x80000000	0xffffffff	0000		00000	0xffffffff		0
0xffffffff	0x80000000	0000		00000	0x80000000		0
0x80000000	0x00000001	0000		00000	0x00000001		0
0x00000001	0x80000000	0000		00000	0x80000000		0
0x00000001	0x00000001	0000		00000	0x00000001		0
0x80000000	0x80000000	0000		00000	0x80000000		0
